price: Яна унга Ўз даргоҳимиздан меҳр ва поклик (ато этдик). У тақволи бўлди.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
